section.title: Exporting data
section.para: You can export widget data to a PDF file or a CSV file for further analysis and reporting. The file contains a snapshot of the data at the time the file is generated.

listitem.para: The PDF file contains a report with a chart and summary data.
The CSV file provides raw data for further processing and analysis.

procedure.title: To export data from a widget

step.para: On the top-right corner of a widget, select Export Data from the drop-down list.
In the Select a file format to export window, select a format and then press Export.
